monaka
Class monaka

java.lang.Object
  monaka.monaka

public class monaka
extends java.lang.Object

Monaka class provides wrapper for Processing sketches.

Usage of Monaka

Constract a monaka object with mode value monaka(int mode), then use IO functions such as digitalOutput(int pin, int val), analogOutput(int pin, int val), digitalInput(int pin), and analogInput(int pin). Note that this package depends on theMidiBus. (http://www.smallbutdigital.com/themidibus.php) theMidiBus package is required to use Monaka on Processing.

Version:
009
Author:
Yoshitaka Kuwata, morecat_lab

Method Detail

listMidiBus

public void listMidiBus()
List all installed MIDI devices. The index, name and type (input/output/unavailable) of each devices will be indicated.

Parameters:

noteOn

public void noteOn(int channel,
                   int pitch,
                   int velocity)
Call Back function for noteOn. Users should not use this function.

Parameters:
channel - MIDI channel number. Monaka use only channel 1 (value =0)
pitch - pitch number
velocity - velocity value
